name: playwright_template
description: Playwright demo project to be used as template

scripts.docker_local: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml up -d --build && docker exec playwright npx playwright test -c src/config/local.config.ts
scripts.docker_stage: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml up -d --build && docker exec playwright npx playwright test -c src/config/stage.config.ts
scripts.docker_prod: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml up -d --build && docker exec playwright npx playwright test -c src/config/prod.config.ts
scripts.allure: npx allure generate allure-results --clean  && npx allure open allure-report
